title: Strange behavior when using 'copy package'
description: When using the 'copy package' functionality in the org.eclipse.jdt.internal.ui package of the jdt.ui3 module, there is a strange behavior observed. After selecting the xxx package as the destination, the package 'ui' is copied into the xx package, resulting in the xx package containing both the original 'ui' package and the copied 'ui' package.
OB: The xx package contains a duplicated 'ui' package.
